Title: Reviewing papers as you would like your papers to be reviewed
Abstract: © 2019 Baum.Peer review can seem like a barrier we have to scale in order to publish. In this Perspective, we ask what would happen if, instead, the focus of peer review was to help everyone in the field improve the quality of their papers.
